casebody.data:
FEDERAL NATIONAL MORTGAGE ASSOCIATION, Plaintiff and Appellee,
v.
Gail STAFFORD, Defendant, Counter-Claimant and Appellant,
v.
Federal National Mortgage Association, and John Does 1-50, Counter-Defendants and Appellees. DA 18-0439 Supreme Court of Montana. Submitted on Briefs: March 27, 2019
Decided: May 14, 2019

Affirm. Deny.
